trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Owensboro
There were no other sightings in Owensboro on or around July 7th 2009
Summary: Came out of the west was a solid bright light me my sister my girlfriend and I all seen it flew over head and dissapeared in the east.
divs: Sighting Detailsi went outside with my girlfriend to smoke a cigerette and i looked up and this bright light that was solid not flashing bigger thana plane showed up flew overhead with no sound or any type of tail to signify burners or meteorite flew directly over our head my girlfriend ran inside got my sister by the time she came out she only caught a few seconds glimpse as it dissapeared in the east.It moved in a straight line there was no dought as soon as i seen it i knew what it was and my girlfriend verifyed it.my heart was racing i was excited.
